title: In some Games my AA-Button just stops working
body: The Game just starts like usual, but in some games, I press some random kind of button combination and the Middle of my Mousecursor just turns red and I'm not able to Auto Attack anymore, I've seen no threats at all about this bug, I feel like I'm the only one who gets this bug. So annoying, after I reconnect it's fixed but still. I don't want to leave every game just to fix my Autoattacks
